name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 14, Xinhua News Agency reported on the Vladivostok Fishermen's Day

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 12, Sichuan University announced that it would cancel 31 majors at one time.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 14, in Zhoukou, Henan, a woman posted on a social media platform that after she resigned from Bawang Cha Ji, the store posted her ID number for public display, and also said that she was suppressed by the store manager while at work. Currently, Bawang Cha Ji's official account has been flooded with comments from netizens about the incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 14, Zigong, Sichuan. It was reported online that a man in black was stabbed and fell to the ground in Banqiao Town, Fushun. Many residents watched the scene and medical staff were treating the situation on the spot.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 14, Shenzhen, Guangdong. A woman wearing a cosplay outfit was pointed out by a staff member when she was riding the subway that it would cause discomfort to children and that she should remove her makeup before getting on the subway. Woman: I hope the Shenzhen Metro will respond officially.
July 13, Changsha, Hunan. A woman posted a video saying that she wore a kimono to attend the Changsha ACC Comic Exhibition and was told by the security guard that she could not enter.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On July 14, a blogger posted: The Chinese Olympic team went to the Paris Olympics this time, but the public's attention was very low. I don't understand where the problem lies.
Netizens responded: "I am refining lard, don't bother me" and "You took our money and enjoyed it without our consent, and you still want me to applaud?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Today, China's National Bureau of Statistics released data: GDP grew 5% year-on-year in the first half of this year. The spokesperson of the National Bureau of Statistics said that the favorable conditions facing my country's development are stronger than the unfavorable factors, and the stable and long-term positive development trend will not change.
Then, many official media opened selected comments.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 15, The Paper launched a poll asking “Will you let your child enroll in civil engineering?” As of now, 5,287 votes have been cast for “not enrolling” and only 298 votes for “maybe enrolling”.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: At present, Trump-related T-shirts have been completely removed from domestic platforms

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 14, Chengdu. A netizen found a whole rat in his takeaway.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 14, some netizens took photos of trees lining the road in Jiayi Town, Pingjiang County, Yueyang City, Hunan Province, with slogans such as "No rape of young girls" and "No sexual relations with girls under the age of 14".

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 14, Li Jianwei, a professor at China University of Political Science and Law, revealed that in order to attract more customers, a seafood restaurant reached an agreement with nearby drivers that if the drivers took passengers to the restaurant for dinner, they would be paid a reward of 5-20 yuan. As a result, the Xiamen Siming District Market Supervision and Administration Bureau fined the restaurant 1 million yuan. Professor Li Jianwei said, "I think it's too much. He is a small restaurant and may not make 200,000 yuan a year."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 15, Guangzhou, Guangdong. Merchants of Zhongcun decoration stores reported that the bad environment led to a slump in physical store business, while the property management company has been raising rents every year. On that day, the merchants collectively marched to demand a rent reduction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 13, Dongguan, Guangdong. In the canteen of Phase 1 of Dongguan Fuqiang Electronics Factory, a rat crawls on the food. As early as 2021, workers claimed to have eaten foreign objects in their meals.
https://t.co/JmxldVSAKw

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On July 13, human rights activist Zhang Pancheng published an open letter, and he was suspected of being out of touch again. In the letter, he said that he had been followed for a long time, and his ID card and household registration book were confiscated. Local authorities came to his home many times to identify him as a "mental patient", and he said that if he was taken away again, he would go on a hunger strike to protest.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, many netizens said that they had experienced "limits", and some people's bank card limits were even reduced to 500 yuan. Many banks recently issued announcements to adjust the transaction limits of non-counter channels in order to combat and prevent telecommunications fraud.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 14 (report) Zhongshan, Guangdong. Employees reported that the company only gave 50 yuan per month in high temperature subsidies, while Guangdong Province stipulates that the high temperature subsidy is 300 yuan per person per month.
In response, many netizens left messages saying that they did not even have high temperature subsidies, or only had very little subsidies.
